testcase.name: Talbot Search Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Home Page..........................................passed When title of Home Page is Talbot...........................................passed Then user clicks on searchbox and enters "pajama"...........................passed Then user clicks on submit..................................................passed Then user clicks on choice..................................................passed Then user sees item details.................................................passed

testcase.name: Talbot Location Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Talbot.....................................................passed When user clicks on Store Locator...........................................passed Then user selects distance..................................................passed Then user enters "60188" and clicks find stores.............................passed Then user clicks on first choice............................................passed Then user can see location detail...........................................passed

testcase.name: Talbot GiftCard Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Talbot page................................................passed When user scrolls down and clicks giftcard link.............................passed Then user clicks hundred dollar amount......................................passed Then user clicks personalize and types in "To jane with love"...............passed Then user clicks add to bag.................................................passed Then user can see shopping bag..............................................passed Then user closes browser....................................................passed
